title: Bio-Wirtshaus Zum Fliegerbauer on Stelzlhof
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Organic, Beer/Wine, German, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. German restaurant located in a cozy country inn. The weekly updated menu offers at least one vegan dish. Uses regional organic products and foods. Drinks are almost all organic. Chef is knowledgeable with respect to vegetarian/vegan cuisine and responds to custom orders. In summer there is seating outside.
